name: Jakten på Diamanten
description:
A game I made for and with my cousins Alexandra (9 years), Isabella (7 years). They decided what this game was going to be about and drew all the sprites and textures in the game. I wanted to learn how to program a game (using a visual scripting tool - PlayMaker) so I thought it was great that my cousins told me what the game was going to be about, all I had to do was implement assets and realize their ideas:)

(I have not tested the Mac build, please let me know if it doesn't work hehe)

Sound effects borrowed from here: http://soundbible.com/free-sound-effects-1.html

Music from: http://freemusicarchive.org/
